UniprotID	Q9H9B4
Accession	Q9H9B4;B3KPW3;D3DQN2;Q9HA53
EntryName	SFXN1_HUMAN
ProteinName	Sideroflexin-1
GeneName	SFXN1
Length	322
Function	Amino acid transporter importing serine, an essential substrate of the mitochondrial branch of the one-carbon pathway, into mitochondria. Mitochondrial serine is then converted to glycine and formate, which exits to the cytosol where it is used to generate the charged folates that serve as one-carbon donors (PubMed:30442778). May also transport other amino acids including alanine and cysteine (PubMed:30442778).
Subcellular Location	Mitochondrion inner membrane
Disorder	0.4186,0.4476,0.5055,0.5758,0.5992,0.4507,0.4831,0.5176,0.5342,0.5533,0.4541,0.4119,0.4149,0.4119,0.3667,0.4582,0.4220,0.2951,0.1852,0.2645,0.1914,0.2715,0.2849,0.2884,0.2645,0.2715,0.2988,0.2094,0.1298,0.1349,0.1399,0.2436,0.3356,0.2503,0.2715,0.2951,0.2575,0.2645,0.3599,0.3807,0.3149,0.3774,0.3840,0.2752,0.2541,0.2645,0.2541,0.2541,0.2715,0.3807,0.4017,0.3910,0.2918,0.2817,0.3840,0.3774,0.4017,0.3460,0.2503,0.2575,0.3053,0.3631,0.2752,0.1852,0.1852,0.1942,0.1823,0.1554,0.1349,0.1852,0.1823,0.1702,0.1731,0.2503,0.2645,0.2436,0.1881,0.1070,0.1070,0.1137,0.1115,0.1349,0.1028,0.1671,0.2129,0.3182,0.2436,0.2715,0.2541,0.3704,0.3249,0.3053,0.2064,0.2064,0.2064,0.1323,0.1028,0.1028,0.1702,0.1476,0.1399,0.1424,0.1449,0.1914,0.2193,0.2193,0.1528,0.1399,0.0646,0.0463,0.0463,0.0341,0.0198,0.0356,0.0372,0.0364,0.0287,0.0414,0.0463,0.0294,0.0380,0.0765,0.0405,0.0414,0.0433,0.0372,0.0454,0.0662,0.1184,0.1731,0.2918,0.1969,0.2988,0.3149,0.3149,0.3249,0.2399,0.3426,0.3392,0.3356,0.2988,0.2951,0.2817,0.3392,0.3392,0.3356,0.3286,0.2951,0.2292,0.1852,0.2224,0.1671,0.1643,0.1554,0.1424,0.1424,0.1028,0.1028,0.1070,0.1048,0.1275,0.1501,0.2064,0.2328,0.1852,0.1070,0.1007,0.1070,0.0662,0.0646,0.0948,0.0443,0.0433,0.0592,0.0372,0.0518,0.0364,0.0356,0.0676,0.0372,0.0205,0.0214,0.0188,0.0218,0.0119,0.0143,0.0248,0.0263,0.0263,0.0618,0.0555,0.0463,0.0592,0.0749,0.0506,0.0948,0.0765,0.1028,0.1373,0.1424,0.2328,0.3286,0.3286,0.4330,0.3182,0.4087,0.4766,0.4619,0.4149,0.4186,0.3631,0.4186,0.4186,0.5055,0.4685,0.4725,0.4507,0.5456,0.4582,0.3704,0.2817,0.2645,0.2752,0.1731,0.1048,0.1399,0.1162,0.0835,0.1028,0.1251,0.0929,0.0909,0.0618,0.0734,0.0835,0.0506,0.0506,0.0364,0.0372,0.0631,0.0555,0.0967,0.0985,0.0967,0.1349,0.1137,0.0835,0.1048,0.1349,0.0568,0.0690,0.0483,0.0473,0.0870,0.0581,0.0568,0.0631,0.1206,0.0985,0.0909,0.0483,0.0543,0.0473,0.0231,0.0141,0.0109,0.0133,0.0117,0.0100,0.0101,0.0202,0.0111,0.0117,0.0100,0.0090,0.0075,0.0050,0.0073,0.0072,0.0094,0.0093,0.0136,0.0165,0.0163,0.0
